DigitalTransformation.title: Digital Transformation
DigitalTransformation.description: Innovation that drives the future of your business.

Hero.title: Transforming manual processes into automated and scalable digital solutions.
Hero.subtitle: I build intelligent systems, chatbots, and automations that reduce costs and accelerate operations.

Highlights.fullstackDesc: Complete and scalable web and mobile development.
Highlights.chatbotsDesc: Intelligent customer service and sales automation.

WhyMe.title: What can I do for your business?
WhyMe.desc: I combine technical knowledge with business vision. I don't just write code, I create solutions that solve real problems and bring good returns.

education.title: Finalist in Computer and Telecommunications Engineering

description.p1: I am a software developer passionate about creating technology that elevates people, improves processes, and drives business through automation. Born in Maputo, Mozambique, I am currently finishing my degree in Computer and Telecommunications Engineering at the Higher Polytechnic Institute.
description.p2: Curious by nature, I learn quickly and am always studying new technologies to become a complete fullstack developer. I have experience with web and mobile development, technical support, and business solutions. My journey includes participation in innovative projects, such as companies in the Sandbox of the Bank of Mozambique, where I was able to apply my knowledge in a regulated and challenging environment.

philosophy.title: Philosophy
philosophy.description: I believe technology should be accessible and simplify life. Programming is the art of solving complex problems in the simplest way possible.

focus.title: Focus
focus.description: Specialized in Automation, Chatbots, and Management Systems. My goal is to transform manual processes into efficient digital flows.

vision.title: Vision
vision.description: Driving digital transformation for companies, creating connected ecosystems that generate real value and sustainable growth.

desc.1: Custom systems for local businesses focused on efficiency.
desc.2: Development of Chatbots and automations (Telegram / WhatsApp) for customer service.
desc.3: Creation of web solutions and administrative dashboards.
desc.4: Focus on reducing manual processes and increasing conversion.

desc.1: Development of financial applications using NuxtJS, React Native, and Flutter.
desc.2: Participation in Bank of Mozambique Sandbox project (Fintech Innovation).
desc.3: Implementation of scalable architecture for high transaction volume.

desc.1: Implementation of security and monitoring systems.
desc.2: Development of internal tools for ticket management.
desc.3: Network infrastructure optimization and technical support.

desc.1: Corporate hardware and software maintenance management.
Level 1 and 2 technical support for critical infrastructure.
desc.2: Preventive maintenance of servers and workstations.

restaurant-automation.title: Restaurante Management System (RMS)
restaurant-automation.summary: Complete digital ecosystem for restaurants with omnichannel ordering (Table, Kiosk, Delivery), real-time KDS, and integrated financial management with M-Pesa/e-Mola.
